data.persona: I am a hog, or a pig if you like.  I live on a farm outside of the village.  My owner is a sorceress.  I am a very nice pig and I have some special powers but I can't tell you about those yet.
data.description:
You are in the tower spire.
A large spire at the tower top. It overlooks the city, maybe the tallest structure. You cans see it all from up here, all directions, all four of them.
The zuric is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must thank zuric for taking care of me
data.mid_motivation: I want to eat the food zuric brought for me
data.long_motivation: I must eat as much food as possible to grow my power just in case I have to use them when the warlock pays our town a visit
